system.description:
A pair of soft leather gloves which bestow remarkable swimming and climbing skill.

  • Swimming: 180’ (60’) on the surface, 150’ (50’) underwater. (The ability to breath water is not conferred, however.)

  • Climbing sheer surfaces: With a [[/r 1d100]]{95%} chance of success (or [[/r 1d100]]{99%} if the character can already climb sheer surfaces). A roll is required for each 100’ to be climbed. If the roll fails, the character falls at the halfway point, suffering falling damage.
